backend/main.mo: Motoko actor combining storage, access control, approval flows, profiles, and user blocking with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence scores.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of various frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook describing how to retry deployments, what to monitor, and common causes of transient build failures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling session state, block checks, view routing, and storage migrations.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Action: Reusable action tile component with gradient backgrounds, size variants, and icon/label display.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/dashbo: Centralized Tailwind class constants for consistent dashboard border, padding, and layout styling.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: A customizable confirmation dialog using AlertDialog components with confirm/cancel handlers and styling variants.
A small wrapper around sonner toast to show success, error, and info notifications.
Main app layout with header, branding, scroll effects, logout handling, and MT‑Loan prompt support.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomShe: A bottom sheet modal with backdrop, scroll locking, and a close button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: A three‑button footer bar for dashboard actions with icons and gradients.
A centered mobile-style frame wrapping dashboard content with fixed viewport height.
frontend/src/components/layout/PopupModa: A fullscreen modal with backdrop, scroll lock, close button, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Controls admin navigation across multiple sections and displays MT‑Loan password prompt.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Bottom navigation bar for admin views with icons and active-state styling.
Grid of action tiles for navigating admin sections, using dynamic labels and icons.
Renders the admin avatar, loading from profile photo, branding logo, or a fallback, and updates on storage or photo changes.
Provides the admin layout with a dynamic header, title, navigation controls, and bottom navigation wrapper.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines admin view types, nav item structure, and the full list of navigation items with labels and icons.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Loads account totals from storage and displays income, expense, and due summary KPI cards.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Displays pending user requests and allows approving or rejecting them with storage updates and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Blo: Loads approved users from backend and enables searching, blocking, and unblocking with confirmation and status refresh.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Manages company payment entries, allowing adding, listing, totaling, and deleting reports with confirmation flows.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Loads workers and account balances from storage and displays each worker’s bill, cost, and remaining balance in a table.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Manages snack expense entries, splitting costs among selected workers, updating their accounts, and listing editable history entries.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Handles payment/loan entries shared across workers, updates their individual accounts, and shows a sortable history list.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Records production quantities and rates for workers, stores entries in history, and displays a deletable production log.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Simple wrapper that renders the system settings panel.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Provides tabs for labels, layout, branding, backups, user sharing, profile photo, and MT Loan settings, with full save/load logic.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Displays user approval and blocking sections in a combined layout.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Manages worker rate settings including adding, deleting, editing rates, locking, and selecting workers with storage persistence.
Creates work entries using worker-specific rates, calculates totals per worker, saves history, and displays past entries.
frontend/src/features/auth/BlockedAccoun: Displays a blocked account message with a logout button.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Provides a branded login form with validation and session-based authentication.
Handles user registration, validation, pending request storage, and confirmation flow.
frontend/src/features/mt-loan/MtLoanPass: Shows a password dialog for MT Loan access, validating credentials and setting authorization.
frontend/src/features/mt-loan/UserPanelL: Placeholder component for a future MT Loan user panel; currently returns null.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Implements a support messaging interface for users and admins with thread management and message sending.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Cl: Displays a live-updating clock with formatted time and date.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Se: Bottom sheet showing totals for selected workers based on stored account data.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Renders KPI summary cards for due amount, total work, and total cost.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Nasta: Loads and displays the user's nasta expense history with per‑head totals.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Shows the user's loan/payment history filtered from stored histories.
frontend/src/features/user/production/pr: Aggregates normalized production history by worker, summing double, single, and earnings totals.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Displays production history with summary totals and a detailed table of entries.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Normalizes worker name fields, returning the best available name array or a fallback.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: Profile settings UI that lets a logged‑in user change their stored password and view profile details.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Main user dashboard component managing view modes and loading KPI data from storage.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkEntr: Modal showing detailed info for a single work entry and the current user's earnings.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Displays a user‑filtered list of work entries with totals and an option to view entry details.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Computes per‑user and group totals for work entries using new, legacy, or fallback rate data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Loads and updates branding settings, subscribing to branding update events.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardOverrides: Loads dashboard override settings and provides lookup helpers, updating on custom events.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Simple hash‑based routing hook that tracks and updates the window location hash.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and stored identity restoration via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useSingleConfirmSubmi: Manages a single‑confirmation submit flow with duplicate‑submit prevention.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserNotice.ts: Custom React hook that loads notice config and updates state when a notice-config-updated event is dispatched.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, gradients, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Manages branding settings in localStorage and provides helpers for accessing logo URLs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminCredential: Handles storing, loading, and validating admin credentials with simple localStorage utilities.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminDashboardL: Manages dashboard layout rules in localStorage, including loading, saving, and updating section layout configs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminSelectedWo: Stores and manages selected worker names for reports, including toggling and cleanup functions.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminTotalsStor: Saves and loads admin total metrics such as taken, work, and due amounts from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/backupRestore.t: Exports selected app data to a JSON backup and restores it by importing and writing keys back to storage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Manages company payment report entries, supports legacy normalization, and computes total work earned.
frontend/src/lib/storage/customSectionsS: Loads and saves custom dashboard section definitions in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/dashboardOverri: Handles customizable dashboard label overrides and dispatches update events on save or reset.
frontend/src/lib/storage/labelSettingsSt: Manages label entries with ordering and overrides, merging defaults and saving updates to localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/mtLoanAuthStora: Stores and checks MT loan authorization status in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/mtLoanIdentityS: Creates, retrieves, and clears MT loan identity data using safe storage wrappers.
frontend/src/lib/storage/mtLoanSettingsS: Handles loading, saving, and validating MT loan settings using safe localStorage access.
frontend/src/lib/storage/noticeStorage.t: Stores and retrieves user notice configuration with error handling and update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/productionHisto: Loads, normalizes, and saves production history entries ensuring consistent structure.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Provides safe localStorage helpers with event dispatching and array normalization utilities.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Runs versioned storage migrations to normalize data structures and update legacy keys.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Manages support message threads, adding messages and retrieving thread data from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userIdStorage.t: Assigns and persists stable numeric user IDs for approved users with migration handling.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Manages profile photos for users and admin, including saving, retrieving, and removal with events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userSharingSett: Loads and saves user sharing settings with defaults and update event dispatching.
frontend/src/lib/storage/workerRatesStor: Handles worker rate loading, saving, migration, and lock state management with legacy support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Provides session context, restores session from storage, handles admin/user login, logout, and profile updates with local persistence and query cache clearing.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for session data, login results, profile updates, and user records.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Exposes a hook to access the SessionContext and ensures it is used within a provider.
frontend/src/utils/moneySplit.ts: Provides utilities for equal money splitting and deriving per-head amounts with consistent rounding.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theming, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, requested features, and architectural notes for MT Loan access control and UI additions.
